Product Title: Amazon Basics Head Strap Camera Mount for GoPro
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2016
Review Title: Stable and comfortable for hands-free footage
Review Description: I used this product scrambling up Angel's Landing in Zion National Park. I wore it over a back-turned ball cap and it was very comfortable and stable. The footage looks great and it freed my hands to climb. A word of caution is to make sure you test the angle of the camera. I aimed it at my eyesight range and the vista footage POV came out a bit too high but because it was a vertical scramble, it caught the route perfectly. So, just make sure you adjust the angle of the camera on the mount lower than you think and/or move your head more extreme to capture footage lower down. Other than that I recommend this product.

Product Title: Amazon Basics Head Strap Camera Mount for GoPro
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 15, 2018
Review Title: If you have to strap a camera to your head... Price and Quality are excellent.
Review Description: I had to make some video of laboratory operations for my work. In the limited time I had I wasn't able to set up a GoPro on a tripod for all the angles I needed. The next best way would be to use a camera on my head angled to show what my hands were doing. But how to strap a camera to my head? Amazon provides.This is a head harness equipped with fixtures to mount a GoPro to the harness. It is well made and adjustable for for all sizes. The mount is well made and fits the connections of a GoPro very well. The mount allows you to angle the camera through 90 degrees.The only downsid that I encountered after wearing this for 90 minutes was the big re-imprint of mounting plate I had on my forehead. If you have to strap a camera to your head then maybe wearing a woolly hat (welders beanie?) underneath the harness.The price and quality are right and if you have to strap a camera to your head this is a good way to go.

Product Title: Amazon Basics Head Strap Camera Mount for GoPro
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 7, 2019
Review Description: The screw that holds the camera onto the mounting is a millimeter too short (just under 18mm - should be 19-20mm like all the other GoPro mount screws) to get a good bit into the hex nut. Because the small number of threads engaging (probably one thread) the nut, any pressure at all when tightening will slip and feel like it strips threads. Will not secure the camera to the headband if you think it has engaged and then falls out. Amazon sent a second unit but it has the same issue. If one has the right tools, some of the plastic shoulder on the screw can be removed to make the threaded portion go deeper into the mount, thus securing the camera.

Product Title: Amazon Basics Head Strap Camera Mount for GoPro
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2019
Review Description: I just got back from a ski trip and had to write this review to save others from making the same mistake I did and relying on this truly abysmal piece of junk to keep your gopro strapped to your helmet.Long story short, I secured my gopro 6 to the head strap and thought I was good to go.  But apparently this thing can't handle anything stronger than a light breeze. By the time I stopped riding, my camera was long gone, all because I actually believed the reviews that said this thing could be used to strap a gopro to a helmet. I'm pretty pissed off to say the least and would highly discourage anyone from buying this thing, especially if you want to use it for snowboarding/skiing.

Product Title: Amazon Basics Head Strap Camera Mount for GoPro
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 6, 2018
Review Title: Great purchase. Looks silly when wearing it. Put on a hat to try to look less silly :)
Review Description: I'm back with a ton of reviews to do :-) I changed my name to Tech O.G. because I started a YouTube channel reflecting that name with the concentration of reviewing tech gear I own. Anywho, I finally have a GoPro Hero 5 Black and I'm now in the hunt for cool accessories for it. I decided to get this head strap because the used price was too good to resist and because I want to record on my GoPro hands free. Granted, it looks absolutely silly on my head but if I wear a hat over it, I don't look too silly with it on. It fits nicely and doesn't apply pressure on the head when worn. Adjusting it is simple, too. It's a very nice product and I'd recommend it if you want to record with your GoPro hands free.

Product Title: Amazon Basics Head Strap Camera Mount for GoPro
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on May 1, 2017
Review Title: worked with Akaso EK7000 perfect, great price, very well made!
Review Description: I used this with the Akaso EK700 4k waterproof camera that I also bought on Amazon and i couldn't be happier.  I took this on vacation to use in the ocean and the quality is top notch.  The plastic buckles are very thick and well made, same with the nylon strap.  The camera was secure on my head and while I wasn't winning any fashion contests, it did what I wanted and every huge wave that smashed into us, did nothing to the camera. Best of all this thing is dirt cheap $8 is what these should cost!

Product Title: Amazon Basics Head Strap Camera Mount for GoPro
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2018
Review Title: Sticks to your head like a xenomorph facehugger
Review Description: This mount really pleases me.  It has grippy stuff on the inside of the elastic bands.  It's easy to adjust the rig on my head, and it's easy to adjust the camera to the angle I desire.  Once it's set up, it's makes for a reasonably stable camera platform that looks wherever you look.  I'm sure I could get myself into extreme situations that would send it flying, and I almost want to go out and do some dumb things just to see what it actually takes to knock it off my head.

Product Title: Amazon Basics Head Strap Camera Mount for GoPro
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2018
Review Description: Well made product and works great for fishing and hiking in Alaska. The only downside of head straps in general is that you can't see the angle of view to make sure the shot is perfect (unless you have a buddy to help you).RECOMMENDATION - One thing to keep in mind if you're planning to use this for hiking: when you're hiking on steep terrain, most of the time you're head will be down looking at the ground / at your footwork. In other words, the camera may be looking at the ground more often than your surroundings. It may sound obvious but just keep your activity in mind when wearing this in order to adjust the GoPro angle accordingly. I had a buddy with me when fishing and got great footage but didn't when hiking and found my angles weren't where I wanted them.

Product Title: Amazon Basics Head Strap Camera Mount for GoPro
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 14, 2017
Review Title: You'll realize why this is the #1 selling GoPro mount
Review Description: Why is it #1?  Because 1) It's built like military grade, and 2) It's ridiculously cheap! I finally got to using this thing, and wow, I'm impressed with the build. The rubberized grip material adds just the right amount of "grab" to hold securely over a helmet. I can't imagine how any other head strap could justify the higher cost.

Product Title: Amazon Basics Head Strap Camera Mount for GoPro
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2021
Review Description: This action cam harness is good quality and probably fits most GoPro compatible action cameras. I put my headband to the test yesterday while taking my kids snow sledding using my CamPark V40. The straps are made of quality elastic and is a solid product. The harness and action cam did pop off my head a couple times, BUT.... I was cruising at breakneck speed down a steep icy hill on a snow sled and launched a good 15 feet and the harness popped off upon impacting the ground. That being said.... the straps are not made of steel or leather, they are elastic... a good elastic, but nevertheless.... you'll need to understand that the harness is made for action scenarios with movement and whatnot... but there is definitely a breaking point with regards to how much action the headband can take.... .I will say that the headband never detached from my action cam when it popped off my head, so the attachment pieces worked wonderfully, I just don't think I wrenched the head harness down hard enough for the physical nature of what I was doing. I give this 5 stars even though it came off my head, but that was really my fault... I should have used a helmet to attach the action cam due to the extreme physical abuse my body took while careening uncontrollably down that icy hill. It's a good product. It is well built, good materials, easy to install the cam and it was comfortable. I would definitely recommend!

Product Title: Amazon Basics Head Strap Camera Mount for GoPro
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 19, 2021
Review Description: Definitely gets the job done. Fits on the head well and is easy to adjust. The material seems to be good quality. I use it snowboarding all the time

Product Title: Amazon Basics Head Strap Camera Mount for GoPro
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2020
Review Description: Bought this for my 12 year old son for Christmas. He uses it all the time. He even dropped it in the pool while trying to adjust the settings outside the waterproof case, we left it for 2 days off with the battery out...& it still worked! He's much more careful with it now though. He bought a head strap to use it while he plays paintball & likes it better than the other mounts that it came with. But such a great buy and AMAZING price for the quality! Love all the videos he takes!

Product Title: Amazon Basics Head Strap Camera Mount for GoPro
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2020
Review Title: has a horrible smell out of the box
Review Description: I needed a head strap to film some POV videos with my GoPro and AmazonBasics products have never let me down at the price point they offer things at. When I got this head strap I definitely wasn't let down by the quality nor the versatility but my product that I received had a horrid smell to it. It almost smelled like the gas coming out of the rubber during manufacturing.I dont know if any other buyers had this issue but I had to return it immediately because of the smell.

Product Title: Amazon Basics Head Strap Camera Mount for GoPro
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2019
Review Description: I love this head strap. It fits perfectly and doesn’t ever come off. I’ve been using it for tough Mudders and Spartan races and had no issues with the mud or water. The plastic is cheap and flimsy, I was carefully tightening my GoPro with no pressure or force and one of the plastic bracket pieces broke off. This was before a race day so I just placed it back on and added super glue and it withstood 6 more races.

Product Title: Amazon Basics Head Strap Camera Mount for GoPro
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2019
Review Title: Keep che king your camera angle
Review Description: If you wear a hat, your bill will get in the way of your money shots. It's also important to know that you need to adjust the camera EVERY time you put this on. I filmed for an entire day after adjusting it, taking it off to spin my hat backwards, and forgetting to re-adjust and all of my videos were about a foot too high to see anything. A waste of video for one of the best fishing days I've had. What a shame. Anyways, it's a pretty good product, but those are some things to keep in mind.

Product Title: Amazon Basics Head Strap Camera Mount for GoPro
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2016
Review Description: The Head Strap Camera Mount is a great product. I use this product when i am on a trampoline or when i am in a pool. This is a high quality product for a low price. This mount can give you awesome first person videos. I have the GoPro HERO session and this mount works great for it.If you use your GoPro a lot than i would recommend that you buy this mount. There are so many pros for this mount and i have not found any cons with it yet. If you don"t have this mount than you should buy it. It makes great videos and it is a great product.

Product Title: Amazon Basics Head Strap Camera Mount for GoPro
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2020
Review Description: I bought this for a Campark camera for trail riding in a Side By Side and for use in formation flying. In both cases there are several other cameras inside and out, but I also wanted to be able to get the images from the pilot's and driver's perspective. This fits the bill.

Product Title: Amazon Basics Head Strap Camera Mount for GoPro
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2020
Review Title: The mount screw that holds the camera in place was stripped
Review Description: Mount screw that holds the camera in place was stripped on arrival so camera falls forward flat on your foreheadsince I already know what my forehead looks like and was hoping to be able to run some hands free video it's not very useful in this capacity!BUT, the head strap is a lot more comfortable that I expected and sits well.

Product Title: Amazon Basics Head Strap Camera Mount for GoPro
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 3, 2017
Review Description: The strap has much more stable video than I would have thought. Immediately when I got it, I put it on and went running. That seemed like a pretty good test seeing that I wasn't trying to run smoothly or anything and though it felt like it might be moving on my head, it produced much better video than I was expecting. The headband takes a bit of adjusting and figuring out what's good for you but it didn't seem to want to slip at all. I would still put my floaty on in the water just out of precaution.

Product Title: Amazon Basics Head Strap Camera Mount for GoPro
Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2018
Review Description: The screw will not hold when you put in the GoPro. Bought this for my little guy’s bday and was so disappointed that it doesn’t work. Poor engineering.
